<<<<<<< HEAD
Remarks upon Dr. Sherlock's book, intituled, The case of the allegiance due to soveraign princes, stated and resolved, &c. Johnson, Samuel, 1649-1703.
The second edition.
[2], 1 [i.e. 13], [1] p.
Printed at London, and re-printed in Edinburgh, [Edinburgh] : anno Dom. 1691.
Attributed to Johnson by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints. Running title reads: Remarks upon Dr. Sherlock's case of allegiance. Page 13 misnumbered 1. Anonymous. By Samuel Johnson. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
